author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text:
Talk from people who actually know. Who've been reporting on this for over a decade. Who've been Goldblum warning everyone in Jurassic Park.
https://t.co/tVXXTMHy5h

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: If you live in an abortion-friendly state, tell your state gov't to be like Connecticut! https://t.co/y6DYXaKRqM @GovMurphy @LtGovOliver  Also, keep up with how reproductive justice is being attacked & how that will have reverberating effects with the crew at @RewireNewsGroup

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: Anyone else with a @peacockTV subscription see their "My Stuff" lists erased?

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: I hate when people say "don't go looking for [form of bigotry]". I'm actually trying to avoid all forms of bigotry. But all the people telling me to not look for bigotry are slapping me in the face with it.

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: Human rights are THE most important issues. No economy will ever be solid if there is racism, sexism, etc. (Environmental issues are also human rights issues; humans need clean air & potable water.)

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: So many apparently did not learn why it took so long for the abuses of cosby, r. kelly, & weinstein to come to light. So many also ignoring how allen & polanski are still defended & kept from meeting justice.

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: It's amazing how eager ppl are to believe a man who dated a 17 y/o when he was nearly 30, continues to defend roman polanski, has a history of violent rage tantrums, a history of misogyny, a history of manipulation, and a history of giving drugs to a minor.

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: It's also possible for both members of a couple to be toxic. It's not always either/or.

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: It is wild to me that so many people have forgotten or are deliberately ignoring that johnny depp has a long history of violent rage tantrums & general narcissistic behavior.

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: When someone says they disagree with trans people about transness, they are essentially saying they disagree with the trans person's existance.

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: We need this. https://t.co/RalHoHbNoB

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: Some people have said The One With The Whales is "The Least Star Trek" Star Trek movie. But, thematically, it is "The Most Star Strek" Star Trek movie. And hence, my favorite. https://t.co/sdPaCcDCoh

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: So maybe I need to participate in these polls again? I stopped because I felt like I wasn't actually being listened to. Like specific responses were being looked for - they wanted bias confirmation. But maybe they need to be inundated with reality. https://t.co/lyJ1ZZrTHM

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: Politicians should not be deciding what constitutes good medicine https://t.co/gyS1YGD55v via @statnews

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: JFC, America! This is pathetic. We should be ashamed. https://t.co/BEzZ78rj7r

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: Leia is a very spoiled pupper & lucky it's time to clean the sheets & pillows. https://t.co/DxkJOYI2mb

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: I know people who have no problem letting their kid watch violent stuff but draw the line about periods in Turning Red. wtf is wrong with this world?

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: Recommendations for other old and/or non-Anglo centric spellings or variations of Jennifer? I love Gwenhwyfar, but I also like mixing things up.

text: I was 1 year away from having my first major anxiety attack & existential crisis in adulthood. https://t.co/PaghiV2Lcb

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: The number of in-laws, neighbors, coworkers, etc., I've wanted to slap for saying shit like, "They should be grateful for what we did for them. Nobody ever did anything for us Irish or Italians." https://t.co/ZiigUnZkq7

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: Unpopular New Jersey food opinion: Manco & Manco pizza is meh, & we can & have done better in the Garden State.

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: Can we have a @parksandrec spin-off series (or mini series) about the Zorpies in which #ChrisPine plays a young Herb? Please & thank you.

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: Must see for @emilysonaplane  and @DanColon https://t.co/cKKkKYIrV3

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: I need to rewatch every episode of @AbbottElemABC to ensure I have visited all the Philly places the characters call out.

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: An "AU" fake scenario ranging from my sisters & me never having been abused as kids to my trans cousin never being harassed for existing, to "karens" never grabbing the hair of my Black women friends... https://t.co/0HbcOktEEw

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: The more I learn, the more I understand why Mookie threw the trash can into Sal's window. It still makes me sad, but in different ways.

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: I plan to spend my lunch break looking for good resources to educate some ppl abt the bullying, harassment & discrimination Black women experience bc of their hair. Meanwhile, if anyone has suggestions, I open to hearing them. Thanks.

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: Could & should have Will Smith responded differently? Probably. But if we condemn Smith, we should also condemn Rock. There are many kinds of violence. None of them should be overlooked.

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: There is a difference between joking and mocking. Joking punches up. Mocking punches down. Chris Rock mocked a Black woman's hair. He did not joke about a rich & famous person. As a grown man & professional comedian, he should know this difference.

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: Leia knows what to do on cold days. https://t.co/gR628AROik

author: frellelonandothernarcissists
text: This is possibly the only thread many of us need to read on the issue. Many of us (everyone who isn't Black) should be quiet and learn. https://t.co/aZ3ybCkkHM
